title: Presumption of capacity
context: [ยง346-251] Presumption of capacity. An individual shall be presumed capable of making decisions concerning the individual&rsquo;s person. A determination that an individual lacks capacity under this part shall not be construed as a finding that the individual lacks capacity for any other purpose. [L 1989, c 381, pt of ยง1; am L 1990, c 144, ยง1 and c 234, ยง9]
